content: Good little camera. Easy to set up and connect to the app.
Ok but lacks one important feature, ability to set the date & time! Email verification found in spam folder.
If it could tell when I left home and came back I'd give it 5 stars

The app and the cameras were abit of a hassle to set up and it did take awhile for it to get working but once it got working the app and cameras are working flawlessly and i couldn't be happier. I'm feeling safer and more confident leaving my home alone. I do recommend that yale release a tutorial though, it would really improve your ratings. Thanks again
Hello, I too am struggling with getting email confirmation to register, my wife is on yahoo the same as me and got the email with 1 try, I have been trying for days to no avail!! Please help??
App won't download
Had vervication code sent 3 times non been reconized now been blocked by

Difficult to connect at first as instructions not clear which app to download. But once installed the camera is great. My wife and I can look in on the pets whenever we want from our phones, take turns to talk to them, and night mode is great quality too.
This app looks for a verification code to register which it does not send. It is not being blocked by my email account. Yale support does not respond.

Great system however the app to view the cameras let's it down. Every time I seem to load the app and click on a camera to view I get connection fail. I have to shut the app and load it 1-2 times before it connects. I know the PVR is connected to the internet so don't know why this happens.
So far so good. Bit backache setting up but worth the effort in staying with it
It says there is an error!
Honestly awful I didn't get a verification code on my email. Can't connect camera. Set up is just a nightmare. Not worth the money
Very clear recording
Once i got my head around the set up, everything else went well
I love this app thank you I can watch my dog 🐶 thanks for getting back to me.

It shows in the app a different time (1hour earlier) even if in the settings I have put the London or +00 universal time zone. Also, whould be great if that indoor camera will trigger the SR alarm if any motion is detected?
Brilliant device great piece of mind having it on my property.
Brilliant so easy to set up and picture quality excellent

For people struggling when pairing the camera. The code is NOT in the box it is on the back of the camera. And use an alternate email address or add to filters for verification. That said great picture do time will tell. As for customer service I sent an email last week about another I have problems with still not heard anything. May as well send by post it takes that long lol
Awful app. Can't even register as its not emailing me the verification code. Contacted yale a week ago and heard nothing back. Terrible app and terrible customer service/support
It won't work and will not send verification code to my email
All sorted now 👍and so far everything is working great...love it!
It's terrible. Wasted whole day tried every method to get it to work but this stupid app won't send code to register and you can proceed anywhere without registration. So I have bought dead weight
Paperwork and app may as well be in Chinese for all the use they are. CS try to be helpful but can't get a verification code to get it working. Still 1* for the product.
Fantastic once set up
Brilliant Camera and how it works , but app needs a lot of work done on it to equal the camera.

It's crazy the app and the full sistem it wodent let me on the app saying I needed to up date but phone not conpatabl so got new phone naw it's coming up I don't have eney devises so I'd wot tech advised an reset cameras naw they won't conect back up to eney yale account it's saying there locked to my old phone but clearly not as iv tryd on my old phone and still dosent work an can't contact eneyone as I work late
easy to set up works fast great image quality

I love the picture quality on my SV-DFFI-₩ camera, but it refuses to automatically record on motion detection... it says it's recorded but on playback it won't load and constantly says 'Play error. Click to refresh' 😓 Please help.
Cannot get verification code instructions require to be simpler
Wont even get past the first hurdle, refuses to send varification code.
Easy to setup After getting pin number from spam folder Pulled hair out before looking in spam folder

Wow!! Only just bought camera and installed app. Easy to connect and get working. Brilliant picture quality, even in the dark using it's built-in infrared lights. Some superb features for such an inexpensive system. Will definitely buy more and add to app...up to 4 cameras. Very impressed.

Overall it is a good app, very simple to connect the cameras. However more recently the camera is displayed as being offline, which I can only rectify by physically removing the camera plug and then putting it back... not very useful when out and about.
Can't obtain registration code, I cannot register to use, can you help please
Very easy to set up
Great clean image even in the night the emages are very good , I'm really happy with this camera.

Told to install this app to get the Aldi yale camera to work but doesn't give you the option to set up account, just tells you to enter email and password and doesn't recognise you as you haven't set up account
Brilliant well worth it
Brilliant bits of kit. Was well pleased with the first camera so have now installed a second, suggest installing 128 GB sd cards though. I have and they work fine.

App is utterly useless. Can't even get email verification code. Response from Assa Abloy is that some mails are being delayed by some email providers. I have no response whatsoever using yahoo and Gmail for 24hrs from repeated attempts. This is not a competent organisation that are responsible for setting this up and administering this system. Will return all products immediately

Not getting verification code sent through so non starter. Told having problems sending out verification emails! What a joke from such a big company! Taking this back today and never buying a Yale product again!

Poor quality picture at times.. I'd like to know why only one person can log in at one time. My last camera let up to 4 log in so when home we didn't have to call or txt the other to log out.. Pretty much makes my camera redundant while the other half is working.. I have know clue whats happening on my premises..
Really good
Trying to register a new account but validation codes are not being sent.
Very easy to setup

I bought 3 cameras, tried to register them, it said email was sent with a code. I tried all weekend, the email never arrived. I checked all the emails, inbox, spam, junk mail, searched Yale etc. So i basically have 3 useless cameras now. Can you tell me why the email with the code did not arrive no matter what I did? Thanks
Can't even get a verification code to register on app. Camera is a complete waste of money.
It will not send a verification code to my e-mail so I cannot register and use my camera.

Bad. Requires location services just to configure WiFi on a camera. Cannot add a camera without sending Yale your location. Cannot restrict cameras to be on local WiFi - the app and cameras must be given web access - essentially the cameras become a security liability. And no information on the actual videol stream address is available in the app or with the camera. I.e. you use this Yale app and suffer the problems whether you want to or not. Oh, and it constantly fails to connect to cams.

Took about 50 attempts to receive my activation email. Once that finally came through it worked great for 1 day and now I dont get the notifications anymore. It still records events but I no longer get the notification to my phone.
I've a Samsung S10+ and this app works brilliantly. Very fast and the camera quality is crystal clear

Trying to setup a camera to watch my motorcycle and this won't work cause your system is broken and won't send me a code to my email. I've looked in junk mail too, terrible system, will be returning my camera
Product looks really good, very discrete. Good images. A doddle to set up .
Can't even get the verification code to sign up checked my junk and spam folder in my emails
Took a little while to get on top of the wi fi settings but after that the system is a dream.
Good so far
OK first you have to persist with this camera i bought from Aldi and the average person should be able to set this up but you have to keep trying
Just bought this camera today, i am an hour now waiting for a cerification code to come in by email, to register the device. Can someone explain why?
It's looking good so far. I've only just set it up which was very easy. Need to play with all the options so will report back later...
Bought a wifi camera can't even set it up won't e-mail me a verification code 😒
Cant even register my acc, not getting verification code to my email after numerous attempts.

Excellent, everything work really well and easy to follow instructions setting up, once you have downloaded the correct app because there are a few yale view apps in play store when you search for it, camera quality really good as well.
Best ever

Customer service is appalling. My issue with my camera started in July and it takes months for them to reply to emails with not much help. Issue still not sorted. As an electrician I will not be recommending due to poor customer service and reliability. Camera is less than a year old and already faulty. Expected better from yale.

The app works reasonably well. However I was under the impression I could link the camera to a dropbox account and store the video securely online. However I can't find how to do this on the app and there is nothing about it in the FAQs
nice
Very good does what I want it for
Good quality Yale cctv system ,app also good to use with this system,24/7 security.
Love how this just works and does what its supposed to do.
Very good

Awful app... Works for 3 weeks then goes offline for a indefinite time, the camera itself is great(picture quality).My broadband is 35 mb. So it's not the broadband.The app needs a lot more work.But I suppose with a free app they are going to spend as little money on it as possible.Time to look for a alternative. The image is upside down now. Tried contact through email, and it's invalid...22nd July '20....still rubbish.. I've emailed numerous times, they say it's my Internet,I have 40mb,its not
No instructions with this how to set up functions. For the less technical minded people in
Worst cctv I have tryed to install ever fose not link to my phone qr code will not link to network or cloud joke u need to make it so its easier to in stall
Mostly excellent.

Out of three camera's I can even get on to one of them I have been invited by my partner and still cant get a camera onto my screen message from yourselves says "you will be logged in shortly or words to that effect ???

The camera app is Unstable..... and the app has a mind of its own sometimes it works sometimes it doesn't and a few bugs . It disconnects itself from the wifi, I wanted to see a recording for the day. It worked then a couple of seconds later it deleted the whole day. Not good. Needs a fix. And don't message me yale to say check my WiFi.... my wifi is fine
I've tried and tried to connect my dvr to my phone with no luck at all :(
Very good app
Great
Issues fixed quickly. Thank you for quick fix
Nice clear pics
Fantastic camera for the money, microphone a little quiet when talking but the speaker picks up very well, i have 2 and have had no problems.

Great app that has everything I need. The system stopped antisocial behaviour (which was the reason for buying the CCTV system). I've linked my cameras to Google home, the Yale IA smart alarm and Philips Hue lighting for great control. The Push notifications and exclusion zones for motion are brilliant.
Does not send email to allow you to register therefore can not get verification code and have wasted a huge amount of money on yale products
Can't log in saying unknown situation please try again

Good camera's when they work. Notifications are not consistent, having to restart the cameras or reinstall the app often. Technical support are not helpful I often have to chase after not receiving callbacks. Which I had chosen a different cctv provider.
Worked fine for weeks now computer says no
Its just so unreliable.
Brilliant easy to set up brilliant camera
Update has RUINED this app. Play error click to refresh everytime I go to open it. This app now only works at random intervals...... not reliable.
Very good
Great for keeping an eye on my pup when we're not at home.
It is a very good app let you know everything you need to know
A bit tricky to set up...but now working great. 4 stars

Unreliable! Works for a variable length of time then displays 'connection failed' every time I try to view my cameras. Only option is to delete and then re-add them/the account. Not reliable, which is a must for security devices.

The cameras, despite the blurb, where a pain to link to the app. However, once this task was finally completed they work very well. Update. To the app designers, please make it easier to set motion detection. That is the point of the cameras and it's way too complicated. I keep forgetting how to do it.
Very good app took a while to try to connect to the wifi but that was my phone, i got a better phone with a decent camera on and connected straight away. Good easy app I like
Excellent quality once app is installed
Great

Easy to use, however the notifications simply don't work, I've received none, my harddrive buzzer goes when motion is detected but unfortunately when I'm out without checking regularly I don't have the piece of mind of getting a notification of motion is detected. My wife's iPhone app doesn't get notifications either. It's the only bad part of an otherwise great system.

I have downloaded this app and tried several times to register but the verification code never gets sent to my e-mail. Done that even phoned and spoke to 2 people 1 will send a code by email never had it another said try gmail still no luck

Updating to reflect recent changes. Motion sense notifications went through a period of being useful and linking to the camera playing the detection, now notifications just open the app at the start page which is useless. I don't understand the new layout, you have to click a play button to show all your cameras. You can configure your own feed view but these reset each time the app opens. Finally messages don't work. Each motion detection shows you as having 99 messages but nothing there. :(
Rubbish app...
Gives 60 seconds to receive an email to get verified code. Then bombs out what idiots returning camera

Unreliable. I have to delete and re add the device to get it to stop saying "connection failed". Seems to only last an hour or two then I have to do it again. Please. Sort out your app! Using 3rd party P2P till this is fixed.

Won't even send me a verification code and locked me out of the app, which I payed for? No instructions or any way to get help. I will be returning this to the store tomorrow, a total waste of money and time.
Perfect
Easy to Install and very clear

Complicated to find individual cameras. Does not work on mobile data when view live feed or pre recorded stream. I have to camera and want a thumbnail each on the home page for quick access in case if incidents and emergency.
Very good n quite easy 2 navigate. 1 problem is dvr keeps changing time i put it on gmt but it auto goes a hour behind 4 some reason n keep getting motion alerts at sunrise
Used to work, now doesn't work, cannot add new cameras anymore, fix this what use is a camera u cannot watch!?
the app works ok my trouble is that TALK TALK my ISP is blocking PORT 80 so i can not view live feeds away from home my appologies YALE VIEW FOR BLAMING YOUR APP kev
Crystal clear vision , easy to install
Nice
Thankyou managed to resolve the problem great value for the money
Useless! Installed it but where you type to register is grey and won't open the keypad to type so can't do anything!!!
Excellent
Great
The worce program I had in my life and customer service do not know what to do too

Sadly since the 'upgrade' I keep getting messages telling me that the storage on each of my camera's I corrupt but when I check they're all fine! One maybe, but all of them? There's an old adage 'if it ain't broke. Don't fix it' I wish software and app designers would consider this before forcibly upgrading everyone without thorough testing!
Great
Great performance at a very reasonable price
Doesnt support my yale cctv yet the old app says the features won't work on my phone properly now... So what am I supposed to do 😒😒
Great tool for security use. Easy to install and has never let me down

Its been more than a year using this app. Never had any issues very smooth app. I left 5 stars but its been 1 month since new update came n im not able to sgare my devices with others and no support from yale. Every time new person on email n no solution. This i was worried, coz most of new uodates messedup smooth running. Hopefully it will be sorted soon.
The idea is good but doesnt very often work, 'play error'....'play error'......'play error', so infuriating.
Good
Brilliant quality video
Brilliant thanks
Update made a big difference would like the memory status to change to always record but now it atleast picks up motion sensor recordings and save for later access 👍🏾
Excellent service

Despite correct time zone being set, time is out by an hour which is stopping notifications...therefore making it useless when out of the home as i don't know if any motion is detected. Yes, notification are enabled!

Not often that I can be bothered to post about good quality and reliable products, mainly because most things are rubbish - Yale and its app on the other hand have been outstanding. I thoroughly recommend Yale products. Very satisfied!

I would give this zero stars if possible! Surely an updated App should be better than the previous! I'd suggest getting your testers to find all the faults prior to releasing such poor software. 100% Dissapointed!

Loving the new app. Well done team! Thanks for the previous response. My assumption is that the motion alert takes me to the moment in time from the main recording, rather than creating a sub recording for when a movement is detected?
Great picture easy to install
Brilliant piece of kit for the price!

Since the update I can no longer always view what was stored previously. and when I can I click on a previous time and it jumps forward an hour. very frustrating. Tried to review last night's footage and there was no record. However when look at footage on system hard drive it is present. Why.
Very good!
The update is remarkable and Can now be viewed on multiple devices. No regrets getting this camera. Nick Louis

I spent an hour or so trawling your site and found a 24 page manual with a lot more info than the first 18 page one dwnld you need to let people know where these manuals are. At least remove the old. ive yet to study and try hence 1 star. So far dissapionting sudden app change doesn't help with no instruction had to fumble around for ages to work out. A lot lacking on all sides and not enough space in review to explain.
Tried for hours over different days to get my phone app to connect to the camera and all I ever get is unable to configure. Wish I'd not bought them.
So far so good. And getting better
I am very happy with the device. It is excellent for me.
Great app helped catch a few people already

Please return the arm and disarm motion detect icon to the first screen like the last version!!! The last version was so quick to set and disarm. This new version that doesn't have that yellow triangle in the top right corner is a pain!! Motion detect on off is now hidden 6 screens into the settings, Not very convinient for setting and un setting every day!! Thank you.

I bought the 8 cameras package and i have just 1 disappointment regarding it, the notification system alerts me of every single flying bug or snow or rain that it captures, if you could add the option to ignore all alerts that are under 1 second duration it would be amazing. And ill gladly give 5 stars.
Excellent for checking my cameras while at work or out 😊
Not really happy with the app. We tried several try to connect button success. We were waiting for the verification code but no results. Really bad. Not happy And I will not recommend it.
Recent update great improvement thanks.

Notifications do not work which makes the whole thing seem fairly pointless. Edit - the app has recently been updated and now works really well. Notifications actually now DO work as they are supposed to. The interface still seems a little dated but overall experience is good. Glad the app is still being developed/worked on.
Great updates
Since update, keeps going offline and will not reconnect. Old app was bad enough but at least it worked. Please sort this out.
Good
21/May/2020 update is a big improvement. The biggest issue of not being able to jump straight to view the movement detections is fixed.
Quality

The new app looks good, it's a massive improvement on the previous version, however there are a few issues. A massive issue is, I no longer get any messages in the 'Message' section of the app. In the Message section, it shows all the channels, and it even shows the red dot with the notification count, but when you tap on the channel to see the individual notifications (and critically, the times), it says 'No messages'. This used to show a full list. If I have an 8 channel CCTV system, but only have 4 cameras, how do I remove channels from the app. It's annoying seeing the extra 4 channels there for no reason.
Works well..
Much improvement since the app update. Would be better if there was an option for cloud storage. That way if the camara was attacked the footage would still be stored online.
Since update can't format sd memory card in WiFi cameras

Best cameras I've come across. Just a shame they dont have any of the standard features another cameras have but without losing the HD quality. I.e. sound! Also would prefer if it recorded in hd. You can watch in hd but it o ly records in sd which is a massive shame. Yale would sell so many more if these features were added. Notifications dont work either!
It says offline
Brilliant easy to operate good clear picture and wifi range going to buy more
Much better, also being able to see how much storage space left on the SD card is a massive help
New update is great! Good app, seamless viewing and lots of control.
Big improvement on the previous app

Does NOT work with Alexa Tried numerous times to set up on Amazon Echo Show but failed. Enabled the Yale View app and logged in but nothing happens thereafter. Customer support is poor, they send you a setup link for downloadable instructions. Which still dont work.

when are you guys going to sort out the play back on mobile devices so you can see the clip of motion activation as you go to watch it play back and it skips past the actual footage you want to see. it's been about a year when I asked this question and you said you will be fixing this issue soon??? it's now over a month and no updates have been done to resolve this problem when will you be fixing this issue Thanks
Can't even register to open the app. I'm either getting a message saying user already exists or user unknown 🤬
Spent 4hrs trying to make up a password and all I got every time "already used" absolute joke...
Camera would be great if app worked and instructions to set up. app is awful does not alert me or record, or basically do anything apart from drain my battery. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY

What a load of rubbish I get notifications but no picture just says play error. Using android. My wife has I phone which has picture but keeps logging her out. Avoid buying this system. Sending this system back and going to buy something that works.

Not receiving notifications. Everything works perfectly other than the most important thing, I am not getting any notifications when the camera is triggered. I have adjusted all necessary settings in app and on phone but still no notifications. I have contacted Yale help line but have not received an answer. I am told they are waiting for a reply from developers. This is not good enough as I note from other reviews that I am not the only one with this issue. GET IT SORTED OR LOSE BUSINESS.

Don't buy yale camera didn't conect to the internet called yale twice they told me to contact internet provider I did they told me you need to contact yale waste of money . Yale too many apps system very complicate pictures not good

Love the camera but since I have had the app I got notifications for 1 day to say that motion has been detected but now I am getting no notifications whatsoever but the camera does record motion is there anyway to resolve this I have went onto your online help and everything it says is enabled on my phone quote frustrating. ThanksThis app has got progressively worse as the days have went on I can barely do anything I have emailed your help team over 4 days ago but not a single reply
Won't contract the camera to the WiFi. Bought another make which worked fine.
Rubbish dont waist your time

Worst cctv app. I have to keep logging in when it detects motion and have to re add all my cameras. I have to do this each time it detects motion. I am so frustrated with this app, they need to fix all the bugs.
Stopped working rubbish.

What a load of rubbish can't reset it back to factory unless you ring them up or email them but email isn't recommended as there to stupid to understand what you mean an tell you you're user name an login when you didn't ask that question..so had to ring them on phone half hour jokes.
Have seen it working but now all i get is playback error while iPhone users get to see images in real-time. Not impressed.
App won't even install on my phone. Fix this please

Just purchased this 4 camera kit. Brought them because of the name Yale. How disappointing. The app records movement and tells you what time but takes you to the live camera when you click on the event. This app is absolutely terrible. I also have a cheap Ezviz camera that cost £30.00 and there app is 100 times better. Shame on you Yale. If I could return these I would do so.
System error some time

Horrible app. Every time I log out then I try login and does not recognise my password and the option recover and reset password is useless as it asks me my username and then it shows me 'username not recognise'! This app is a joke.
Not working been offline for 4 days thanks this is really going to help protect my house
Trying to add device but Can't get past password screen
Avoid
Still not working properly. Takes ages to get the screen up, have to re-log in almost every time. refresh, refresh. Really good once it's working right.
I can make the camera work with my phone. I have tried to configure it using WiFi but nothing, I would like to get some help thank you.
Updates stopped working on Android
How canni get it to record 24 7

Latest update does not work. No problem with iphone app but the latest android update disables android phone from communicating with cameras. Yale should really stop selling their hardware until this is resolved. At least they should roll back to old app version. Poor service indeed.
Since the update i cant access my cameras through the app was working fine before update

Terrible. Avoid this app and camera Update; Yale auto replied to my review here on Play store asking me to contact them. I already had contacted them, this auto reply sent by Yale serves no purpose. I will probably remove them and return them.

Good when it works. Crashes and doesn't connect to the cameras more often than it works. I'm disappointed by this Yale app. I chose a Yale CCTV system primarily because of wanting a well supported app to go along side.

APP DOES NOT WORK WITH ECHO SHOW customer service is non existent UPDATE: Amazon technicians have now confirmed that the Yale Skill for the Echo Show simply does not work, Yale have been made aware but are choosing to keep quiet and not inform their customers. There is nothing you can do to get this working with your Echo Show until Yale update/fix their broken skill
Total rubbish .

Awful experience. Constantly offline.. Unable to connect... Buffers like its on dial up.. Very poor indeed..yale should not be selling this product knowing that the user experience is so poor. No one has a good review on this product. Wish I'd checked before purchasing.. Will return product.please do not buy..
App keeps telling me I've got the passcode to my wifi wrong. No I haven't . Had to take wife camera back

Solid App... HOWEVER doesn't allow multiple/simultaneous login without logging the other user out, including notifications... Not sure but I think they're trying to save money wherever it's hosted (AWS, I think) :/
Problem talking to the DVR, can't always login needs more work by Yale
Just had two cameras installed and using the official yale app only one camera shows. Then, when i close the app and restart it... i cant access the device at all. Useless.
Horrific loud noise when it is trying to connect that forces my media volume from mute to maximum and after 30 minutes of trying it still hasn't connected

Horrid UX and set-up, updates rare it seems. Have tried hooking up second camera but get error message which is not found anywhere. Recorded movements skip when watching so have to try and scan to be able to see the right part of the recording. How this is not unified with Yale Home app is insane, and with no manuals or error codes or proper troubleshooting this really makes one furious. Having forked out a lot of € for something which rarely works is very annoying. All text in very poor english

People you will find the camera code at the usb cable ... and sure you have 2.4 wireless mode ... only way to make it work ... also I give it 3 stars only because till now no push notifications in my iphone I don't know why ? .. its working in android perfect
Probably loading up camera stuck on loading 99% but no preview happens alot any idea why or a update as seems alot of people have the same problem
Taking a long time to download

Installation problems all the time as soon as I scan or manually enter camera Id it finds camera then freezes so cannot move to next step. 2 hrs later and still no success what a total waste of money, there are cheaper and easier to install wifi cams out there, very disappointing from yale, used to think the smart system was ok now having second thought and reviewing my security around my home
Hello speaker function does not work What can I do About this? I press the microphone button to talk! Then It says failed to talk!
i know its hard to intalled but its successful alredy

Not very clear instructions to set up, You're better off clicking WPS button on Router & Camera itself to config. After 30 mins of trying, finally it works! Very pleased with quality, and the fact I can use 4g to view this when I'm out and about. Very nice HD Quality. 👍

The history record option is allways an hour behind no dst selected fine on the device itself just not the app making it really dificult to select a point within that hour as it allways jumps to the end of the hour Select motion detect set to record only no message email notifications ect, on device so you can do a motion search on recorded fottage auto enables it on the app and notifys me on every time its triggerd really is way tomany bugs in the app

Completely unreliable. Only pushes PIR motion detection of you've actively opened the sap and clicked on the camera. Long buffer time before showing live stream and intercom only works when it wants to, also being very sore to activate. App only works stand alone and does not integrate with the Yale home master app for alarm.

Once device is added I am unable to get the 4 cameras onto the android app. Once I come out of the setup preview I am unable to see any of the cameras on the front page. My other half has an iPhone which is working fine but is quite annoying only 1 person can be logged in at a time.

Edited review finally PUSH ALERTS that work you have to turn off human motion only otherwise alert zones Will not work and get notified of every car that passes. Customer services do not explain this and give up on replying when they dont have an answer. The camera is good but randomly loses connection and only way to correct is by resetting from plug switch. Still decent camera no silly monthly fees like others out there app usability could be better, notifications do not take u to recordings.
Cant find a way to get notifications on my phone. According to FAQ, there should be a setting for getting notifications on my phone however cannot find it under Settings

App can be temperamental sometimes it can fail to load or just freeze and it can jump alot while on playback also you shud be able to have two devices logged on at the same time, me and the wife use this app every day and it can a little frustrating having to log in everytime after one another having using separate phones. As a expensive yale product you would think they would of nailed all the issues from the start. Ive had my cctv over a year now and the app still requires alot tweaking.

A lot of room for improvement. Only one person can be logged in at a time which is extremely frustrating. Makes me wish we never bought it. Good picture and easy to install but when viewing footage back, it always jumps or skips back to the beginning. Footage takes forever to load or save if needed.

App ok, easy to navigate & use. Just requires tweaking, app needs multi log in like alarm system, the wife & I need to be getting camera notifications. App should take you to recording (with memory card installed) not live view when clicking on notification or atleast have the option to choose. Audio from camera end not great when talking live, tried contacting support on several occasions to either get no response or one then nothing? Not good especially after spending £500 on alarm & camera.
Please update this app. It formats my sd card but will not switch storage on it keeps saying failed.However it does record on to the card.

Awful app that needs proper development. Got network not stable errors when trying set cctv up when phone (didn't work with tablet) and camera was near router and had full wi-fi signal. Interface unintuitive and unresponsive, kept shutting down. When finally setup I placed the device near to where i was going to install to test it, found out that cctv could not pickup my wifi. All other devices could, so sending cctv back. Finally it took 10 attempts to delete my yale account. Just avoid.
Bugs
Good

Initially this was problematic for the App, the camera would not show. Yale support provided a firmware update for the DVR. There are some issues though. The DVR is not compatible with Panasonic TVs. I have set up the fingerprint login, but this is not an option when logging in. The login does not let me paste from my pwd manager. Only cam 1 is remembered the others need adding everytime I login, fortunately they are easy to add. Overall, Ok, but I was expecting a lot more.

Brilliant but needs work! i love the app it works as intended but logs me out if my girlfriend logs in, would be useful to have both of us logged in like we can with the alarm system. please update this 😁
Have a problem, when connected to WiFi works but when using 4g the camera won't load completely gets to 99% and stays on that, test many location when full signal and no different. Please fix

Great CCTV systems but app needs work. The app constantly logs you out. When you get notifications from the CCTV and go to view them in the app it just takes you to the current feed, making the notification pointless. Also if you go to view recording history and scroll to a time it will automatically take you to the start of that hour.
Awful .... could not connect to wife despite being next to router. Stupid stupid sound when trying to connect ... no fail information given and instructions are useless. Have returned unit to store

Camera is great, pity about the app, its awful. Vague and unhelpful. Finding away round is pure guess work. Probably worst app I've ever used! No user manual and online help is poor. Camera is good value for money.
didnt work

you guys need to make a new app and fast! i just paid 100 quid for something that the app is not ready for! my mrs cant log in if im logged in and vice versa, the human detection picks up absolutely everything so your phone goes off every 2 seconds killing ure phone battery so you end up logging out but then what is the point of the camera even being there! really disappointed considering i went for the camera in the first place because of yale being such a 'big well known' home security company

absolutely rubbish, cant cast it on my tv, and can only have it on my mobile and not on my husbands. useless will be changing to swann. waste my hard earned cash and scammed by yet another big company. should not be able to sell these cameras as do not work as advertised look at all these bad reviews. you should be sued.

What an awfully design app. Does not work correctly. If I log in ki ks the wife out. Can't sign up for multiple accounts so we can both view. Mine only let's me view one camera even though I have 4!! And after I have used it once the app now freezes when I log in and does not show me pics. Absolutely disgraceful app. Please contact me ASAP. Don't expect this after shelling out £300 for a system..

WASTED A WHOLE DAY. NO REPLY ON EMAIL, IS A WASTE OF TIME. EACH CUSTOMER ADVISOR GIVES DIFFERENT ADVISE. NOT TRAINED PROPERLY. THEY ARE SELLING A PRODUCT NOT TESTED OR BACKED UP PROPERLY. THE APP IS A JOKE. LACK OF CLEAR INSTRUCTIONS FOR A SIMPLE BUT TECHNICALLY COMPLEX SYSTEM. IF YOU ARE UNFORTUNATE ENOUGH TO HIT A HURDLE IT WILL FEEL LIKE A BRICK WALL. BUY AND USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

does not work at all unable to view cameras on my phone worked fine at 1st and now just a black screen and only says I have one camera , connected the box to the t.v. so cameras are working fine just the app is a load of rubbish

love my yale smart alarm kit so thought i would add 2 cameras. app is rubbish cant seem to have two channels with two differnt motion zones. did the update and now have a black area on the front camera which i cant remove. no functions seem logical and just cant set up it up to do what i want. the yale smart alarm kit was so easy to set up and use this seems to have been developed to completely different standards and developers.
UTTER, UTTER RUBBISH! The softwear is so useless, it won't read the QR patch, AND won't acknowledge the serial number when I manually type it in. Save your money, don't waste it on this.
Good app BUT cant set more then one time schedule which is quite annoying for motion detection. Hoping there will be an update to allow this
Get Notifications on every movement even I have Selected human Detection.. Keep Distracting.. I'm afraid I will not ignore when it's really required.
No longer recording anything. Can watch live view but camera doesn't react to motion or sound. Constantly have to sign in again as it logs me out. I'm close to replacing my Yale set up.
very poor,could not get the app to locate the camera via wifi or using the cable. returned camera and deleted app. yale reviews say 86percent of customer s unhappy.
it will not let us log back into app, even though we have reset password etc on the DVR itself

Using Google pixel 2 with EE network, works great. Had to change IPV4 to IPV4 / IPV6 on mobile network APN Protocol to allow it to work through mobile data. Now works well with home broadband wifi as well as mobile data. Using device yale 1080p IP camera ( Square Shaped ).
EDIT Motion detect with push notifications now working. Good app if it stays working
good at the start but about 1 week in and I've stopped getting motion notifications

S9+ Works well, simple and easy to use. Good little app that means to view and save CCTV I can use my phone so my DVR can be hidden away as it is quite loud. the app is easier to use than the DVR system itself. I like that it automatically streams in SD but you can quickly switch to HD on any camera feed. Also like that you can save snap shots and clips of footage using your phone which is really quick and easy and save directly to your phone! Fantastic feature that makes life a lot easier!!
Had our cameras installed on Monday app worked ok for 2 days now it keeps saying connection failed and will not allow me into the app at all.
The app doesn't control the CCTV as advertised. Pretty rubbish really. Connection is more fails than success. Generally rubbish Yale system in general

I am using this with the 1080 Indoor WiFi camera brilliant picture easy to set up on my Galaxy S3 You have to push the SD micro card right in using something think bit fiddly with my big hands. It says the firmware needs an update nothing has happened yet. Going to get the motion detection to work

Only just got the indoor WiFi camera today but this app is a nightmare. Badly written. Not in the slightest intuitive. Can't get notifications to work. (motion). Or rather it will send motion alarms BUT the app does NOT actually tell you its received a notification therefore somebody is in my home, motion triggers but app doesn't push notify me.. Useless! Doesn't recognise the sd card (micro sd card incidentally) I'll give it a couple of days then it's going back to the shop.

App records movement and tells you what time but then takes you to the live camera when you click the event so you have to manually scroll to that time to see what happened. To make things worse the scrolling is really hard to control even at its most zoomed in. Not a good experience at all from such a big company. If this stuff ever gets fixed I will revise my review but for now it is not great.
When it works the app is good but I have to regularly reinstall it when it fails to connect with the cameras via Wi-Fi or data. This is the only way I can re-establish remote viewing.

Camera keeps going offline albeit I,m close to wifi hub. Also play error reports a lot. No support for outdoor camera. Very very poor online support as it only covers CCTV DVR systems. Wish I had stuck to the cheap Chinese with wiFi cameras.

After registering and entering code sent to me the app tells me I'm not registered. After re registering the app tells me I'm not recognised. So frustrating considering the cost of the camera I thought this would be a breeze.. going to return the camera.

Very poor. Keeps crashing the app and disconnecting the wifi so far just 
unreliable. Yale should stick to locks.
Please resolve the problem with soft I can't connect with my phone

I cant even connect the app/device. Complete waste of money and time 
installing the cameras

App is ok quality of picture on DVR very clear , nothing wrong with app. 
The speed of view and connect depend on internet provider. When connect I 
can view 4 cameras in the same time couldn't with swann.the good points app 
is easy to use and connect to internet via p2p application.not bad with 
mobile network view. I have Yale alarm and I always like quality and 
durability of products

Really bad app considering how much I paid for my cameras and DVR. Often 
fails to connect. Tells me that my cameras are offline when they aren't. 
Awful event logging and playback controls - Can only start playback at 
hourly intervals, have to manually play to recorded events, No fast replay 
etc.... Needs a lot of work before it will be useable. Very unhappy.
